8.26.20  2:10 am   I really love your airport terminal song. I feel like it really captured that feeling of life in motion, people coming together in a sort of unknowing unity, and just these genuinely beautiful feelings I get at an airport. I don't know how to describe it fully - there's like this vibrance of life. Thanks for also knowing it, if that's what the song is about.
